thread.title: Kit Siang: Criticism of TV3 journalist is valid
thread.title_full: Kit Siang: Criticism of TV3 journalist is valid

title: Kit Siang: Criticism of TV3 journalist is valid
text:
More 
DAP parliamentary leader Lim Kit Siang said that his criticism of a journalist from TV3 on Tuesday was valid because the news organisation concerned is a government tool. 
Lim said that while he agreed with media practitioner pressure group Geramm that the "media is not the enemy", traditional media organisations such as TV3 are controlled entirely by Najib Abdul Razak's administration.
